## ContextualArabicConverter class

Converter between arabic isolated forms (in Unicode Block 'Arabic') and their contextual forms (in Unicode Block 'Arabic Presentation Forms-B').

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ContextualArabicConverter 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [convert(input)](./harp-text-canvas.contextualarabicconverter.convert.md) |  | Converts isolated arabic characters into their contextual form. |
